movieDescription: When a speedy extraterrestrial hedgehog crashes on Earth, he makes a home — but nefarious forces want to capture him. Based on the video game.
movieCaste: Jim Carry, Ben Schwartz, James Mardsen

movieDescription: A devout man embarks on a journey to reunite a mute Pakistani girl with her family across the border. This heartwarming tale transcends national boundaries, showcasing themes of humanity and love in a divided world.

Based on wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat, the film follows his journey to train his daughters to become world-class wrestlers. It challenges gender norms and showcases the triumph of hard work and determination in a patriarchal society.

Set in colonial India, villagers challenge British officers to a cricket match to avoid oppressive taxes. This epic tale of courage and unity combines sports with a strong sense of nationalism, capturing the spirit of resistance.

A comedic critique of the Indian education system, this film follows three engineering students who challenge societal expectations. It emphasizes the importance of friendship and pursuing one's passions over rote learning, creating a heartwarming narrative.
movieCaste: Aamir Khan, R. Madhavan, Sharman Joshi
